r - Static variable in class ca.concordia.risk.strategies.RandomStrategy
 
RandomStrategy - Class in ca.concordia.risk.strategies
Random strategy that reinforces random a random country, attacks a random number of times a random country, and fortifies a random country, all following the standard rules for each phase.
